title: Masjid makes congregational dua after salah, I can't cross over rows, what to do? assim al hakeem
transcript: so in mid they do congregational Dua people will be praying in the Rose to leave I have to cross over over the people in my front row but that is difficult so what should I do no problem you can remain seated but do not indulge in their congregational Dua so don't say a mean don't pay attention to them just do your Subhan Allah Subhan Allah while they're making their Dua read read the last and the likes and Allah Knows Best
